title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.167 - Hospital
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.167 - Hospital

State Regulations

An establishment that provides, through an organized
medical or professional staff, permanent facilities that include inpatient
beds, medical services and continuous nursing services, diagnosis and treatment
for patients. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.167

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
